name: scitran-nifti-montage
label: SciTran: NIfTI Montage Creation Tool
description: Creates a montage (zip, or png) from a NIfTI file.
author: SciTran Team

voxel_order.description: str [default 'LPS'] Three character string indicating the voxel order.

tile_size.description: int [default 256] Tile size for generated zip or directory pyramid (has no affect when montage_type='png').

montage_type.description: str [default 'zip'] Type of montage to create. can be 'zip', or 'png'.
